title: So we can have "Schoolgirl Ahri", but no Schoolgirl Vel'Koz?

replies.body: End tentacle discrimination please Riot.

{{champion:103}} can get a schoolgirl skin, but {{champion:134}}  can't get a Dodgeball skin and {{champion:104}}  can't have a cigar.

Tell me about discrimination.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tO1V2Ltc,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-08-05T01:03:20.512+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} can get a schoolgirl skin, but {{champion:134}}  can't get a Dodgeball skin and {{champion:104}}  can't have a cigar.
> 
> Tell me about discrimination.

truuuuu
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/dHIjEdwM-give-graves-his-cigar *leaves this right here*
Don't forget Vi and a Boxer skin.
Tentacle Lissandra skin pls :c

HentaIce? Sorry, I'll pun*ch myself in the face for that one. 

Actually, I did see that concept and it looked really cool. Wouldn't mind it.

hey meddler, i was wondering whether i could talk to you in regards of game/champion design as i wish to become one.

thankyou for your time
:)
We can have Schoolgirl Vel'koz. Who said you couldn't have Schoolgirl Vel'koz? Although I guess it would be Schoolthing Vel'koz technically.

Vel'Koz's tips page very specifically refers to Vel'Koz as a "him."  It is a schoolboy, not a schoolthing.
Check your privilege

No, we need Proffessor Eyebeam Velkoz. He is a Research professor not a student. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/BK1jt7bU-so-was-ao-shin-scrapped?comment=000400010000

Research and Destroy.
I concur :)

I mean, we already have headmistress Fiora and now we have students. 

What's an academy without its professors? :3

Also I nominate Viktor to go along for the ride with Vel'Koz.

Viktor would make a great teacher! He invented all these amazing things but someone stole his work and patented it and now he's just a bitter school teacher. Until he is diagnosed with a terminal disease and turns to manufacturing drugs to make a fast buck for his family before he goes... no wait that's Breaking Bad.

For some reason I would like to see Breaking Bard. I can see him processing the meeps into a rich gold fueled king pin. 


WHAT'S HIS NAME??? CALL HIM (*random flute noises*)!!!!!!
I AM THE ONE WHO MAGICAL JOURNEYS!

Don't forget, Syndra can be the gym teacher, where everybody plays dodgeball!

School-nurse Zed because hey ninjas make good nurses (don't piss them off, otherwise they might 'forget' what's medicine and what's poison). Also a male nurse would be cool.

 Music Instructor Bard because obvious reasons ;3

Hall Monitor Twisted Fate

Groundskeeper Gragas/Nasus (who farms with a rake and has a red beard!)

Eh, just throwing out ideas. Blegh. My brain thingy hurts.

Yeah! I am hoping these are well received skins because it would be fun to do more. We've actually ideated on a bunch of them already because they are a theme we all got excited over - imagining League champions at college >:D

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tO1V2Ltc,comment-id=0005000200000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-08-07T07:47:10.341+0000)
>
> Yeah! I am hoping these are well received skins because it would be fun to do more. We've actually ideated on a bunch of them already because they are a theme we all got excited over - imagining League champions at college >:D

There are several problems with these skins as they currently stand.

1.  **It's way too soon for Ekko to get a new skin** - This honestly feels like a purely cynical move on the company's part to quickly cash in on a popular champion's release.  I'm all for getting more skins released faster, but not less than 10 weeks after the champion was released.
2.  **The other champs in the set aren't starving for skin love** - This set will have Ahri's 7th skin (I count default as a skin), and her second one released this year (Challenger Ahri).  Darius and Vladimir also had skins released for them in late 2014.  
3.  **There are many champs already on your backlog** - While the company recently discussed "tech debt" in a dev blog, the skins team have their own "skin debt" for [champs forever waiting for new skins](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/3bochNfU-top-14-league-champs-with-the-longest-wait-since-their-last-skin).  Surely, at least one of those champs could have been considered a worthy candidate for inclusion in this set?  (Headmaster Yi,_ for heaven's sake!_)
   * Even if the company believes that the old skins of recently reworked champs like Kassadin and Sion count as "new," there are long neglected champions like Zed, Lissandra, Lucian and Diana that could use some love from the skins team.

My words are probably going to fall on deaf ears and mean nothing in the grand scheme of things to you and the company, but these are the problems I see going forward with this plan.  I mean, will patch 5.17 have "Angler Tamn Kench," a Fisherman/Anglerfish themed skin for the River King?

Academy Jinx. So Darius can have a fellow delinquent.

I ship them....

> As always, vote on the content you enjoy based on how valuable you think it is, and yes, Schoolgirl Vel'koz is wrong for every possible reason.

~Riot, on Skins and Champion Concepts Board

We must end this!
D:< I wonder if that was written by someone on the skins team? 'Wrong' is a very subjective term.
I'm not convinced it's the bad sort of wrong.
Plus 1 for School thing Vel'Koz !

http://gyazo.com/307db1f446f0d5345bb1b751a404f70c

Well it never said they couldn't...
Next year..... we can only hope.

But Vel'koz is not a girl...

what i want is "Schooleye Vel'koz"
Professor Eyebeam?
Yeah that sounds way better.
I think we're aware of Vel'koz being a boy, but I think a skirt is just more fitting for him.

**ACADEMY **Ahri.

Not schoolgirl.
We all know 'tis Schoolgirl
They do need to put special interaction between Ahri and Vel'koz on this skin though.
{{champion:161}} Eye can tell you this is a travesty.
Chef'Maw, anyone?
School pet Reksai lol
I'd expect {{champion:161}} to be more of a teacher. . . oh god. . . I'm getting some disturbing thoughts again.
"Academy" Vel'Koz, 2k16 {{champion:161}}
{{champion:31}} School Girl Cho'Gath though.
Tentacles... School Girl theme... :3 I'm not sure riot would make such a skin.

>So we can have "Schoolgirl Ahri"-

But {{champion:104}} 's can't have his Cigar? I apologize. That's irrelevant. Back to the skin!

So Ahri, Ekko, and Vladimir can all have new skins when they've gotten skins not even a year ago with Riven having once since Lunar Revel 2014. Meanwhile, **Graves can't have a Cigar and Swain's been waiting more than three years for a skin.**
